title: Party Leaders to meet today (27)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A meeting of all party leaders representing Parliament is being held on Friday (27) under the leadership of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.
Justice Minister Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe, PC stated that the views and suggestions of the party leaders regarding the 21st Amendment Draft Bill will be obtained at the meeting.
The Minister of Justice stated that the ideas and proposals obtained in this manner will be submitted to the Cabinet next week.
